title: Calories in Chicken with Rice
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken with rice for a standard serving, including protein, carbs, fat breakdown, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: One serving: 150 g grilled skinless chicken breast + 150 g cooked white rice; no added oils, sauces, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken cut, rice type, portion sizes, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of chicken with rice provides about 443 kcal, 51 g protein, and 42 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use brown rice instead of white
Add 1 tbsp olive oil for cooking

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of chicken with rice?
faqs.a: About 443 kcal for 150 g chicken + 150 g rice.

faqs.q: What's the protein in chicken with rice?
faqs.a: Roughly 51 g protein per serving, mostly from the chicken.

faqs.q: Does chicken with rice have a lot of carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 42 g carbs per serving, mainly from the rice.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in chicken with rice?
faqs.a: Use less rice, opt for brown rice, or add veggies to bulk it up without many calories.

faqs.q: Are these values for cooked or raw chicken?
faqs.a: Cooked grilled chicken; raw weights would be higher due to water loss during cooking.
